The #MuellerReport conclusion is as simple as it gets: No collusion. Zero. Democrats will predictably refuse to accept the findings–just as they did with the 2016 election–but this #WitchHunt is finally over. Hats off to @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for weathering this partisan storm.

Furthermore, AG Barr states: “…DAG Rod Rosenstein and I have concluded that the evidence developed during the Special Counsel’s investigation is not sufficient to establish that the President committed an obstruction-of-justice offense.” 

No collusion, no obstruction. #Mueller

“The Special Counsel’s investigation did not find that the Trump Campaign or anyone associated with it conspired or coordinated with Russia in its efforts to influence the 2016 U.S. presidential election,” AG Andy Barr. 

We knew this two years ago: Zero collusion. #Mueller

The provisions in #HR1 simply fly in the face of logic, and I will stand strong against this blatant federal overreach and urge my @HouseGOP and @HouseDemocrats colleagues to do the same.

The automatic voter registration provision in #HR1 would lead to huge numbers of illegal immigrants and non-citizens being registered to vote - unless those aliens proactively decline. Do we really believe that folks here illegally are going to admit they're here illegally?

Under #HR1, 6-to-1 public financing for congressional candidates means millions of federal dollars will go toward congressional candidates and campaign consultants. The American people don't want more of their hard-earned money going to politicians.

.@HouseDemocrats claim #HR1 is about greater voter participation, increased election security, and more ethics accountability, but the sales pitch and the reality are two very different things. What's really in H.R. 1?

I spoke on the @HouseFloor today about the many problems with #HR1. For one, the @OfficeGovEthics should be an education & prevention agency, but is openly partisan. The last thing they need is subpoena authority to open the door to overt harassment of our Executive Branch. pic.twitter.com/eyDsIjeQdr
